sentences.sContent: Getting into the brain is like getting into an exclusive nightclub where only the glamorous few are selected.
sentences.sContent_eng: Getting into the brain is like getting into an exclusive nightclub where only the glamorous few are selected.
sentences.sCn: 进入大脑，就像是获准进入独家夜总会，其中只有少数迷人的人物能被选中。

trans.tranOther: a place where people go to dance and drink, which is open late at night
